returns._0: ordering The causal relationship between the events.
The clock snapshot at the time of the event.

params.replicaA: The replica whose clock will be updated.
params.replicaB: The replica whose clock is merged in.

returns.clock: The clock snapshot after the tick.

compare(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Compare two events to determine causal ordering.

dominates(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Check if eventA causally dominates eventB (A happened after B).

getClock(bytes32).notice: Get the current clock for a replica.

getEventClock(bytes32).notice: Get the clock snapshot for an event.

getReplicaCount().notice: Get the total number of registered replicas.

merge(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Merge two replicas' clocks (component-wise max). Updates replicaA's clock.

registerReplica(bytes32).notice: Register a new replica in the system. Must be called before tick.

tick(bytes32).notice: Increment the replica's logical clock and record an event.
